productdetailcontent.contensubttitle: Benefit Headline. Sleep soundly at night knowing that your network is protected by an army of T-1000’s controlled.

techspeccontentpar.accordinsectiontitle: VIRTUAL STORAGE PLATFORM SERIES AVAILABLE MAINFRAME SOFTWARE PRODUCTS
techspeccontentpar.linkName: [Storage and Data Management: Operating System Products,Storage and Data Management: Data Mobility]

accordincontentpar_0.definitions:
[{"contenttitle":"Hitachi Storage Virtualization Operating System(SVOS)"\,"downloadlinklabel":"DOWNLOAD SOFTWARE"\,"downloadtargeturl":"/content/hdscorp/en_us/contactus"\,"emailinformationlabel":"EMAIL SOFTWARE INFORMATION"\,"sectioncontent":"

SVOS offers system management and advanced storage system functions such as storage virtualization\, thin provisioning\, storage service-level controls and performance instrumentation across multiple storage platforms.

\\n

For mainframe storage\, SVOS includes Hitachi Device Manager\, Hitachi Storage Navigator\, Hitachi Dynamic Provisioning for Mainframe\, Hitachi Universal Voume Manager\, Hitachi Virtual Partition Manager\, Hitachi Resource Partition Manager\, Hitachi Data Retention Utility\, performance monitor feature\, volume shredder feature\, LUN manager\, Hitachi Volume Retention\, cache residency manager for mainframe feature\, RAIDCOMN\, Java API\, CCI\, SMI=-S provider and SNMP agent.

\\n"},{"contenttitle":"Hitachi Storage Virtualization Operating System(SVOS)"\,"downloadlinklabel":"DOWNLOAD SOFTWARE"\,"downloadtargeturl":"/content/hdscorp/en_us/contactus"\,"emailinformationlabel":"EMAIL SOFTWARE INFORMATION"\,"sectioncontent":"

SVOS offers system management and advanced storage system functions such as storage virtualization\, thin provisioning\, storage service-level controls and performance instrumentation across multiple storage platforms.

\\n

For mainframe storage\, SVOS includes Hitachi Device Manager\, Hitachi Storage Navigator\, Hitachi Dynamic Provisioning for Mainframe\, Hitachi Universal Voume Manager\, Hitachi Virtual Partition Manager\, Hitachi Resource Partition Manager\, Hitachi Data Retention Utility\, performance monitor feature\, volume shredder feature\, LUN manager\, Hitachi Volume Retention\, cache residency manager for mainframe feature\, RAIDCOMN\, Java API\, CCI\, SMI=-S provider and SNMP agent.

\\n"}]

accordincontentpar_1.definitions:
\{"contenttitle":"Hitachi Storage Virtualization Operating System(SVOS)","downloadlinklabel":"DOWNLOAD SOFTWARE","downloadtargeturl":"","emailinformationlabel":"EMAIL SOFTWARE INFORMATION","sectioncontent":"

SVOS offers system management and advanced storage system functions such as storage virtualization, thin provisioning, storage service-level controls and performance instrumentation across multiple storage platforms.

\\n

For mainframe storage, SVOS includes Hitachi Device Manager, Hitachi Storage Navigator, Hitachi Dynamic Provisioning for Mainframe, Hitachi Universal Voume Manager, Hitachi Virtual Partition Manager, Hitachi Resource Partition Manager, Hitachi Data Retention Utility, performance monitor feature, volume shredder feature, LUN manager, Hitachi Volume Retention, cache residency manager for mainframe feature, RAIDCOMN, Java API, CCI, SMI=-S provider and SNMP agent.

\\n"}

productdetailcommuni.columncontent: Big data analytics involves the processing of large amounts of heterogeneous data derived from multiple sources and across multiple knowledge domains.
Make cities smarter and safer with actionable insights \u0003and predictions. Enable this by bringing together data sources in their original state which can then be analyzed by applications.
